I left my boo, I got someone new with me
I'm going crazy, I should be committed
It's a new era like 59FIFTY

I got a habit of running from love
It started happening when I was young
I got abandonment issues, uh-huh

[Verse 2]
Sometimes I don't even know what I want
I bought a condo and I bought a boat
Might wanna fuck, but I might need a hug
Down at the diner, refilling my mug
Stuff in my cup the same color of my lungs
I want some more but I wanna give up
Not even sure why I'm thinking so much
Besides with the girls who just wanna have fun

[Outro]
Uh-huh (It's Jesse, baby)
Uh-huh (Yeah, yeah, hey)
(Yeah, yeah, hey)
No time to waste, I could be dying today
Uh-huh (Yeah, yeah, hey)
Uh-huh (Yeah, yeah, hey)
Yeah-yeah (Yeah, yeah, hey)
Got no time to waste, I could be dying today

songs.title: AFTERIMAGE
songs.lyrics:
2 ContributorsAFTERIMAGE Lyrics[Intro]
Singing for a while can put a damper in your mood
Lighting will strike twice in my heart cause I let you

[Verse 1]
Inside of my brain
Gave you my body
I made so many tunes
And now none of them sound like you

[Chorus]
After sound
Just keep moving on
Waltzing around
With an afterimage through town
Just an afterimage to me now

[Verse 2]
That one night where we stood in the rain and let our lips fall together
Woke up next morning sick as a dog and we laughed at each other before throwing up

[Verse 3]
Never before have I let mysеlf
Go down the path of love
Like this, it’s hard to lеt go
Of something that made me forget
See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155You might also like[Chorus]
The fall down
Just keep moving on
Waltzing around
With an afterimage through town
Just an afterimage to me now

[Hook]
I stared for too long
I drew him too far away from me
I painted our lives in the sky
Did I overdo it now?
Oh, I hate that I’m so overbearing
Nothing ever goes to plan when you are the reason it's raining indoors

[Chorus]
All gone now
Just keep moving on
Waltzing around
With an afterimage through town
Just an afterimage to me now

[Outro]
Maybe that’s all it was from day one
I let my thoughts run wild
And I made this out to be more than it is
Once againEmbed

[Verse 1]

Your love's so insecure, you're never really sure
Boy, you never listen

101 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsFrançaisEspañolPolskiΕλληνικάAre You Gone Already Lyrics[Intro: Nicki Minaj]
What you doin', Papa? Hi
No, uh-uh, say hi

[Chorus: Billie Eilish]
Don't you know I'm no good for you?
I've learned to lose you, can't afford to
Tore my shirt to stop you bleedin'

You never got to meet Papa (I could lie, say I like it like that)
He sweet proper, he keep Mama on my toes (Like it like that)
I needed help, you booked a flight (I could lie, and say I like it like that)
In three days, you'd meet Papa (Like it like that, mm)

The praying, the shaking

Why would anyone want to love me?
Rich, yes, but are you happy? (Rich, yes, but are you happy?)
All this guilt you carry is heavy (All of this guilt is heavy)
You've already made your peace with me
One day, you'll have to forgive Mommy

[Verse 1]
Lightning is always such a buzz

I spread some gasoline

Bad

But maybe it’s 'cause I'm holding this crossbow

[Outro]

Fine
I'll be the bad guy

I'm not your friend

Use different names at hotel check-ins

I'm sorry if it's torture though (Torture though)
I know, I know
You better lock your door (Oh)
And look at me a little more
We both know I'm worth waitin' for (Waitin' for)
That heavy breathin' on the floor (On the floor)
I'm yours, I'm yours (I'm yours)

[Outro]

I'm not sentimental

1 ContributorBillie Eilish and FINNEAS on SKINNY Lyrics[Spoken Word: Finneas & Billie Eilish]
I really love Billie's ideas
And I don't care if she
Is maybe gonna take a couple more minutes to think about them (Yeah)
Then my idea that is or isn't good
So I want to leave oxygen.
Yeah, that's a great way of putting it
And so that happened, but I think it was a funny shift in our dynamic where I'd be sitting
It was very different
There, playing and Billie would be like, "You're not even saying anything"
And I'd be like, "Wait"
And then what would happen, and it was so beautiful and "SKINNY" is the bеst example of this (Yes)
It's likе you wait, and you wait, and you wait and then Billie says something, "That's so great"
And then I know exactly how to help, I know exactly
Where the missing thing is because we're so on the same
Finneas is so good at that, like, I'll come up with all these ideas
And, and these lyrics and melodies that are tight
And they're great and there's like, this, and this, and this, and this
And then there's like one thing that I need, and I'm like
"I really don't know what this is," and Finneas would just be like
"What if you said this?" and it's, like (Hahaha)
The best lyric of the whole song
I knew exactly what we were— trying to say
Both feeling and how she was feeling
And it was just kind of a rhyme

There's some things that are really hard to say about yourself
I was really struggling with this weird
I don't know, everything was weird in my life
And Finneas was like—
I was just talking about myself
And talking about like
Who I used to be, and the way I used to look, and things, and da-da-da-da
And Finneas just was like
"The old me is still me
And maybe the real me
And I think she's pretty"
You know, and I was like
"Oh, I do think she's pretty"See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155Embed

Chci, aby jsi zůstal
Dokud nebudu v hrobě

songs.title: Billie Eilish - Everything I wanted (cover)
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorBillie Eilish - Everything I wanted (cover) Lyrics[Verse 1]
I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
Not what you'd think
And if I'm bein' honest
It might've been a nightmare
To anyone who might care
Thought I could fly (Fly)
So I stepped off the Golden, mm
Nobody cried (Cried, cried, cried, cried)
Nobody even noticed
I saw them standing right there
Kinda thought they might care (Might care, might care)

[Pre-Chorus]
I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

[Chorus]
And you say, "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here, but you can lеarn to
If I could change the way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wondеr why you hear
'They don't deserve you'"
You might also like[Verse 2]
I tried to scream
But my head was underwater
They called me weak
Like I'm not just somebody's daughter
Coulda been a nightmare
But it feels like they were right there, mm
But it feels like yesterday was a year ago
But I don't wanna let anybody know
'Cause everybody wants something from me now
And I don't wanna let 'em down

[Pre-Chorus]
I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

[Chorus]
And you say, "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here, but you can learn to
If I could change the way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wonder why you hear
'They don't deserve you'"

[Outro]
If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they have said instead?
If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they have said instead?Embed

songs.title: Billie Eilish - Idontwannabeyouanymore | A COLORS SHOW
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorBillie Eilish - Idontwannabeyouanymore | A COLORS SHOW Lyrics[Intro]
Ba da da da da da
Ba da da da da da

[Verse 1]
Don't be that way
Fall apart twice a day
I just wish you could feel what you say
Show, never tell
But I know you too well
Kind of mood that you wish you could sell

[Chorus]
If teardrops could be bottled
There'd be swimming pools filled by models
Told, "A tight dress is what makes you a whore"
If "I love you" was a promise
Would you break it, if you're honest?
Tell the mirror what you know she's heard before
I don't wanna be you
Anymore

[Verse 2]
Hands, hands getting cold
Losing feeling is getting old
Was I made from a broken mold?
Hurt, I can't shake
We've made every mistake

"Billie Bossa Nova" 's a little bit of a... fantasy... I don't even know what. We actually called this song "Billie Bossa Nova" because in... I wanna say like spring of 2019, my brother sent me a beat that he had made and he called it "Billie Bossa Nova" 'cause it was just a Bossa Nova type beat, and I was like "that's amazing," and then, nothing happened for like a year and a half, um... and then... we listened to it again and kind of wrote this fantasy, romanticized, glorified dream.See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155Embed

I don’t know, it, like, gives me comfort to know I'm gonna die, I don't know why. I talked a, I've talked about it since I was a kid. Makes me feel... happy that all things end. "Not My Responsibility"... these are some of my favourite words I've ever written. And I feel like nobody listened [laughs], uh. It's all about body image and all the things we are trained to think and feel about bodies, and it just makes me laugh because I put it out and everyone was like "yes, queen," "body positivity," "uh." songs.title: Billie on OverHeated (Spotify Commentary)
songs.lyrics:
7 ContributorsBillie on OverHeated (Spotify Commentary) LyricsWe took the production from "Not My Responsibility" and made it into a beat, and then wrote "OverHeated", and it's really just about the same thing, y'know, why the fuck is it such a shock that I look like all of you? And I think that that's the funny thing, is the internet... you know, you feel so powerful and... somehow invisible at the same time? But... everybody sees it. You say crazy stuff on the internet thinking "ah... nobody will see it". It's really just about the... insanity of... paparazzi, and articles, and comment sections, and Twitter!See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155Embed

Don't be cautious, don't be kind
You committed, I'm your crime

Dirty water, poison rain

[Pre-Chorus]
By the way, you've been uninvited
'Cause all you say are all the same things I did

[Chorus]
Copycat tryna cop my manner
Watch your back when you can't watch mine

songs.title: Dat Is Het Leven
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorDat Is Het Leven Lyrics[Songtekst van "Dat Is Het Leven"]

[Verse 1]
Ik wil dat je blijft
Totdat de dood ons scheidt
Tot ik in de grond lig begraven
Tot mijn kist door jou wordt gedragen
Als je gaat, dan ga ik mee
Want wat moet ik hier alleen?
Dus als een engel mij dan komt halen
Zijn wij tenminste boven weer samen

[Refrain]
Dat is het leven, niets is een gegeven, dus ik
Pluk elke dag die ik met jou mag delen, en als
Het zo moet wezen, is het maar voor even
Maar is het voor eeuwig, is dat nog beter

[Pre-Chorus]
En als een hemel echt bestaat
Beloof jij dan dat wij elkaar
Weer vinden in wat komt hierna?

[Chorus]
Ik hou je vast totdat ik moet gaan
Totdat ik moet gaan
Tot een engel mij haalt
En dan zie ik je daar
You might also like[Verse 2]
Ik hoop dat je weet
Dat ik voor je leef
Als jij jezelf kon zien door mijn ogen
Dan zou je dat ook zelf gaan geloven
Want je lacht wanneer ik zeg
Dat jij mijn wereld bent
En ooit gaan wij op aarde weer over
En dan ben jij mijn wereld daarboven

[Pre-Chorus]
Dus als een hemel echt bestaat
Beloof jij dan dat wij elkaar
Weer vinden in wat komt hierna?

[Chorus]
(Oh, ik wil nog niet dat je gaat)
Dat is het leven, niets is een gegeven, dus ik (Oh, dat je gaat)
Pluk elke dag die ik met jou mag delen, en als (Dat een engel jou haalt)
Het zo moet wezen, is het maar voor even
Maar is het voor eeuwig, is dat nog beterEmbed

That even when it's time, you might not wanna go

But you are not alone

songs.title: FILMSTRIP
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorFILMSTRIP Lyrics[Verse 1]
Searching for clues in old filmstrips
Its frames are the mystery to guess
The me under the lens, so comical
A play of smiles and tears, my stage's call

My body elongated on graffiti walls
Dancing to a beat, a dance all my own
Don't ask why I'm always this way
I was born to be unlike the norm

[Chorus 1]
I found a filmstrip to soar me high
Roaming between dreams and reality's path
I don't care what others think of me
Just wanna be the truest version of me

The frame tell a story of intrigue
Like a movie that belongs to me
Evеn if the world goes haywire
I'll facе it with a smile, unchanged, true to my core

[Verse 2]
Beneath the flashlights, my expressions exaggerated
Comedy not a disguise, but my shield
The world's too complex, I choose simplicity
Using humor to battle boring rules
See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155You might also likeThe film rolls, capturing my madness
My own director, no applause needed
Filmstrip 1 takes me through time
2 leaves a mark, unique and true

[Chorus 2]
Stepping out of conventional frames
I turn the world upside down
Filmstrip is not just memories
It's a projection of my soul's playground

I paint dreams with vivid colors
Absurd yet shining bright
In this world of filmstrips
I'm the king, no other's sight

[Bridge]
No need to follow others' steps
I have my own dance to move
Holding strips of mine like a book
Their pages filled with my attitude

Let laughter be my pride
Joy my faith unchanged
Let Filmstrip's memories
Soar me through the skies, free and unfetteredEmbed

Followed your footsteps, fell over the edge
Fighting the free fall woke up in my bed
But then I remember the last thing you said

songs.title: Getting Older
songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsGetting Older Lyrics[Intro]
It's so weird

[Verse 1]
I'm getting older, I think I'm aging well
I wish someone had told me I'd be doing this by myself
There's reasons that I'm thankful, there's a lot I'm grateful for
But it's different when a stranger's always waiting at your door
Which is ironic 'cause the strangers seem to want me more
Than anyone before (Anyone before)
Too bad they're usually deranged

[Verse 2]
Last week I realized I crave pity
When I retell a story, I make evеrything sound worse
Can't shake the feeling that I'm just bad at hеaling
And maybe that's the reason why each sentence sounds rehearsed
Which is ironic because when I wasn't honest
I was still being ignored (Lying for attention, just to get neglection)
Now we're estranged

[Chorus]
Things I once enjoyed
Just keep me employed now
Things I'm longing for
Someday, I'll be bored of
It's so weird, oh, it's so weird
That we care so much until we don't
You might also like[Verse 3]
I'm getting older, I've got more on my shoulders
But I'm getting better at admitting when I'm wrong
I'm happier than ever, at least, that's my endeavor
To keep myself together and prioritize my pleasure
'Cause, to be honest, I just wish that what I promise
Would depend on what I'm given (Not on his permission)
(Wasn't my decision) To be abused

[Chorus]
Things I once enjoyed (Ah)
Just keep me employed now
Things I'm longing for (Ah)
Someday, I'll be bored of
It's so weird, so weird
Oh, we care so much, until we don't

[Bridge]
Yeah, oh, oh, oh, ooh
That we care so much
Until we don't

[Outro]
But next week, I hope I'm somewhere laughing
For anybody asking, I promise I'll be fine
I've had some trauma, felt things I didn't wanna
Was too afraid to tell ya, but now I think it's timeEmbed

songs.title: “hide & seek”
songs.lyrics:
1 Contributor“hide & seek” Lyrics[Verse 1]
Seeing the dress, seeing your face
Darken your inner self, we made our lives last longer
Hey, this is the best damn thing in town
Money MIA, can't buy yourself new rings like the other girls
No prom, nothing for me
I always used to get so jealous of the girls at school
Now I don't have to

[Pre-Chorus]
Look at me now mama
I'm doing everything you wanted me too
I've got everything I wanted
Now I can go back

[Chorus]
Let's play some hide and seek
I'll count to three
You can maybe make it out alive
Hurtful words are said
So ask them to play somе hide and seek

[Verse 2]
Practicing the piano might be confusing
Got my chеck for work
Don't have to brag, I have more than you
Used to have a lover but you took him from me
See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155You might also like[Pre-Chorus]

You can maybe make it out alive
Hurtful words are said
So ask them to play some hide and seek

Meet Cinderella, she'll do acapella
She even has a new friend named Bella
Who has another friend named Ella
They can't get enough of each other
I will wait forever until they disappear evermore
Wait for the sun to come down
Wait for the dark to rise

[Outro]
Missing out on everything
Missing out on yourself
Devils will rise and they will get paybackEmbed

I could eat that girl for lunch
Yeah, she dances on my tongue

It's a craving, not a crush, huh
"Call me when you're there"
Said, "I bought you somethin' rare
And I left it under 'Claire'"
So now, she's comin' up the stairs
So I'm pullin' up a chair
And I'm puttin' up my hair

Baby, I think you were made for me
Somebody write down the recipe

You're just so sweet

songs.title: Mongol Empire
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorMongol Empire Lyrics[Intro]
But it’s paper!
Yeah it’s paper money
Paper money? Ha! And people accept these pieces of paper?
Yeah
As if they were…
Coins of pure gold?

[Verse 1]
Pay me, your Silk Road tolls
I own China, us nomads run the globe
Largest land empire, it’s prospering though you dread the “steppes” we took
Grandpa Genghis Khan unified our clans, got our laws organized
Chose men by skill, not family ties, trained us in battle groups
With war declared, riding horses, lеtting arrows fly, soon your kingdom’s terrorized
You’ll submit to spare livеs
Now our lands tie to east and west

[Chorus]
We have a tight rein as trade expands, I love when merchants pass by
Cause it’s tax time

[Bridge]
Cause it’s tax time

[Verse 2]
Conquering like grandpa, we’ve made servants of the Koryo, Slavs and Persians
Crushed Baghdad, but Muslims convert us, we tolerate your faiths
Finally, I beat the Song Chinese, founded the Yuan Dynasty
Confusians serve in my regime, but we’re first, no tests to take
We’ll build up big time, the grand canal will link up to my Khanbaliq/Beijing site
Rule there till the Ming rise
You might also like[Chorus]
Because we have a tight rein as trade expands, I almost took Japan twice, typhoons made us capsize, Stick to land fights

[Bridge]
Stick to land fights
Hahahahaha! Hahahahaha! Hahahahaha!
You’re never gonna rule Japan, yeah

[Verse 3]
You’re good at seagoing trade and cultural exchange
Go to Yangzhou
Need more Europeans like me to lead?
They’ll be desperately trying to get here once I’ve told tales when I get home
Just go fact find
Stick to land fightsEmbed

You are my strange addiction

But you are my strange addiction

Bite my glass, set myself on fire

You should enter it in festivals or carnivals
Thoughts? Pretty good reaction
Pretty cool... right?

You are my strange addiction
You are my strange addiction

songs.title: No Apologies
songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsNo Apologies Lyrics[Chorus: Billie Eilish]
Help, I lost myself again
But I remember you
Don't come back, it won't end well
But I wish you'd tell me too

[Verse 1: GrewSum]
I believe in bigger things than simply living like you're trapped
Every day giving your all and just getting nothing back
There's better places to be at, so I'm chasing after that
I learned to focus on my gifts instead of only what I lack (What I lack)
They want you miserable 'cause that's the way they seem to live
The way this world is built is fucked and now it needs to give
I want a lot more but all I'm seeing is locked doors
But I'll be damned if they keep me out this is everything that I fought for
And I'm built for this, way odd
I'm overworking these day jobs for some asshole who don't understand what I'm worth thinking they could play God
They fuck around with your money, you're nothing to 'em its funny to 'em
They joke around while they hold you down while you work till your hands are bloody
And they don't appreciate you when they seem to hate you
Take the air that you've got to breathe
If they think you're different they'll keep you in this spot where you don't want to be
This world does not have to be the way it all may seem
I took my blindfold off of me and live with no apologies (Apologies, apologies, apologies)

[Bridge: Billie Eilish]
Help, I lost myself again
But I remember you
You might also like[Verse 2: Jimmy Donn]
I only feel good when I'm sleeping or that moment right before I nod
I only feel at peace when I'm fucked up or somewhere out my mind
I don't have the time to sit here and stress about my fucked up life
If I told you that I didn't have problems that would be a fucking lie
I followed in my father's footsteps
He used to drink away his pain
But alcohol isn't strong enough for what I feel to go away
I take handfuls of these little pills that bring me to another place
Then another handful hoping that tomorrow I just might not wake
If you could feel for a moment what I feel every day
That moment in time would torture your mind until hope withered away
This isn't a place you come to stay, we're visitors from another planet
Some get sick and end it while others learn how to manage
I'm so god damn damaged but others see me as a savage
I'm not heartless, I'm hardened and I carry a lot of baggage
So I constantly make up for my imperfections with comedy
I make jokes when I'm nervous like I'm some sort of oddity
No apologies (Apologies, apologies, apologies)

[Chorus: Billie Eilish]
Help, I lost myself again
But I remember you
Don't come back, it won't end well
But I wish you'd tell me tooEmbed

songs.title: No Time to Die
songs.lyrics:
3 ContributorsNo Time to Die Lyrics[Verse 1]
I should have known
I'd leave alone
Just goes to show
That the blood you bleed is just the blood you owe
We were a pair
But I saw you there
Too much to bear
You were my life, but life is far away from fair
Was I stupid to love you?
Was I reckless to help?
Was it obvious to everybody else?

[Chorus]
That I'd fallen for a lie
You were never on my side
Fool me once, fool me twice
Are you death or paradise?
Now you'll never see me cry
There's just no time to die

[Verse 2]
I let it burn
You're no longer my concern, mmm
Faces from my past return
Another lesson yet to learn
You might also like[Chorus]
That I'd fallen for a lie
You were never on my side
Fool me once, fool me twice
Are you death or paradise?
Now you'll never see me cry
There's just no time to die

[Refrain]
No time to die, mmm
No time to die, ooh

[Outro]
Fool me once, fool me twice
Are you death or paradise?
Now you'll never see me cry
There's just no time to die3Embed

songs.title: Not My Responsibility
songs.lyrics:
77 ContributorsTranslationsSvenskaRomânăالعربيةСрпскиTürkçeEspañolРусскийPortuguêsItalianoDeutschFrançaisNot My Responsibility Lyrics[Spoken]
Do you know me?
Really know me?
You have opinions about my opinions
About my music
About my clothes
About my body
Some people hate what I wear
Some people praise it
Some people use it to shame others
Some people use it to shame me
But I feel you watching
Always
And nothing I do goes unseen
So while I feel your stares, your disapproval or your sigh of relief
If I lived by them, I'd never be able to move
Would you like me to be smaller, weaker, softer, taller?
Would you like me to be quiet?
Do my shoulders provoke you? Does my chest?
Am I my stomach? My hips?
The body I was born with
Is it not what you wanted?
If I wear what is comfortable, I am not a woman
If I shed the layers, I'm a slut
Though you've never seen my body, you still judge it
And judge me for it
Why?
We make assumptions about people based on their size
We decide who they are
We decide what they're worth
If I wear more, if I wear less
Who decides what that makes me? What that means?
Is my value based only on your perception?
Or is your opinion of me not my responsibility?See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155You might also like34Embed

songs.title: Paparazzi Instagram Monologue
songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorPaparazzi Instagram Monologue LyricsSo I just wanted to say something real quick, which is yesterday I was at Kimmel, which was amazing, and when I left I had to go to a rehearsal. So to walk to the car, there was an alley that I walked through. Like 500 feet to my left was a group of fans, and then like 500 feet to my right was what I thought was fans and paparazzi.

I started, I went to the left side. I walked all the way over to them and hugged them all, I took pictures and talked to them for a second. Didn't sign anything, because I like don't do that. That's something I don't do, because I used to and I realised all anyone did was sell everything that I signed so I stopped doing that. It's kind of a policy of mine that I don't.

So I talked to them, hugged them all, I went to the other side and as I got closer, like they were cheering for me and stuff, and shouting for my name and stuff, and so I walked.

And as I got closer, I kind of realised that it was pretty much all paparazzi and ebayers, which is what we call people that just take my signature and sell it and couldn't give less of a fuck about me at all.

But I didn't want to like be disrespectful at all, so I went up to them all and I like tried to get like hugs and try to touch all of their hands like do that down the line or whatever, and I started to do that. Nobody put their hands out. Nobody tried to hug me back...I hugged one girl at the end, and so she was really sweet...

But then I tried to walk like a couple feet across from where they were, not where the first group was, but like in the same area that I was in, because I thought that's where there were fans.

When I looked over there, they were gone. And I was like, OK well, I guess nobody here really wants anything from me besides a fucking autograph, which I don't do because these bitches will sell that shit.

Like, I'll sign something if it's like for a special occasion or if somebody's in need or whatever, of course I'm gonna do that. But I have this whole thing about not signing things because I just want to be there. I'd way rather get a hug and talk to you than take a picture with you and fucking sign something so you can sell that shit.

I don't do that, and I've tried to make that clear like a billion times,  and I said it before I went over to them.

Anyway.

I started to walk away, because I realised none of these people actually cared about anything that had to do with me as a person. Um, and so I walked away.

As I started to walk away back to the car, they all started to boo me.

And then they all started calling me a little bitch, and saying I'm gonna lose my Grammy nominations, and you know, what a little fucking you know, whatever, just cursing me out and shit.
See Billie Eilish LiveGet tickets as low as $155Damn, dude, like...

Then I started hearing them comparing, they kept being like, "Lorde would have stopped". I'm like, I did stop! I walked 500 fe- I walked like 1,000 feet to come say hi to you and give some hugs and y'all are booing me and calling me a little bitch?

Like, the fact that people can switch up like that [clicks fingers]...damn. Like wait outside for you, and then immediately they don't get what they want, and they boo you and fucking curse at you.

I'm like, "Bro, I'm 17! You're ..." Oh my God, this shit is...[exasperated whoo!]! I turned around ready to fucking pounce, and then I got told to just ignore it and not give a reaction, which is probably good, and it's probably stupid dumb of me making these videos but...

Mm...anyway, the only reason I'm making this video is because I saw a video of this all happening and I just wanted to clarify what actually happened. Because if you watch the video it literally looks like I'm watching by a bunch of fans and like completely ignoring them and not saying hi to them, which is not at all what happened.

I literally walked from the other side of the alley, which was like 1,000 feet. Which is fine, I'm like happy to do it. But I walked over there literally only to say hi, only to hug people. I literally went over and I was like, "I don't want pictures, I want to hug", and I got pictures of me shoved into my fucking face. And no love whatsoever.

So I left and then I got booed and got called a little bitch and got told that I'm gonna lose my Grammys.

I probably am gonna lose the Grammys, but it's okay though! I'm not worried about that, it's the nomination that counts!

Anyway! I don't know, I just wanted to, I don't even know...I went back to the other side where the real fans were and I was like, "Guys they booed me!" And they were very sweet. You guys are my friends, I love you a lot.

And to the grown men that booed me and called me a little bitch, I hope the best for you. I hope you can find someone else you can use to make money off of and belittle. So yeah, all the best!

Love you paparazzi.1Embed

songs.title: Santa Song
songs.lyrics:
3 ContributorsSanta Song Lyrics[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Hey girls, I have a Christmas question for you: Has this ever happened to you?

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
It sure has Leslie D

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Wait, I haven't asked you yet

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
Asked us what Leslie D?

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Just let me ask it and then you'll know!

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Okay don't get mad...

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Girls, I'm asking if you've ever dreamed of meeting someone your whole entire life, and then when you finally got the chance it didn't go quite as planned

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
Oh, we know just what you're talking about

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
But sing about it anyway just in case we don't
You might also like[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Okay...

[BILLIE EILISH]
It was a winter's night, a quarter to three
I was dozin' by my Christmas tree
When he appeared with a full white beard
The very guy that I revered
I'm talking Santa! (Santa)
I was in the same room as him

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
You met the Santa? Like from the bible?

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Where you nervous Leslie D?

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Was I ever!

[BILLIE EILISH]
But I said to myself, "Don't be a fool
Be smooth as ice and play it cool."
So here is what I said...

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Hey sexy mama nice teeth!
[BILLIE EILISH]
Yeah, I made it weird with Santa
(Santa)

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Now why'd you go ahead and call him mama Leslie D?

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
I don't know I was nervous! He's famous! And I thought if I winked he'd know I was kidding...um

[BILLIE EILISH]
Does Santa hate me?

[ALL]
It's anyone's guess

[BILLIE EILISH]
He said my name
And I said "yes"
He asked if I'd been naughty or nice and I said: (He asked if she'd been naughty or nice and she said)


[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Who's asking Virgin?
Haha!
[BILLIE EILISH]
Yeah I made it weird with Santa!

[ALL]
Santa

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
What does that even mean Leslie D?

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
I don't know, it just came out of my mouth!
Haha...

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
What did Santa do?

[BILLIE EILISH]
He gave an odd smile and said, "Okay sure"
Then he sorta started heading towards the door...

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
Not the chimney?

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
No I think he just wanted to get out of there
So I said, "Okay Santa, you do you!"

[BILLIE EILISH]
And then I made finger guns and I went "zoop zoop"

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Yikes, what is wrong with you?

[EGO NWODIM]
Don't feel bad, it happens to us all

[KATE MCKINNON]
We met him once at a Christmas ball

[KATE MCKINNON, EGO NWODIM]
How could we converse with him? We should've rehearsed
Cause then he asked us if we were good
And here's what we said:

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
You tell me, you're in charge Daddy...

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Woah!

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
I thought I was flirting, I don't know
But then I remembered, maybe he has a wife?

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
So then I said
"Hey Santa, so you and Mrs. Clause never had children
Was that a conscious decision
Or was there like a health issue there?"
"Or are the elves your children
And you keep trying to make a tall one?"

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Oh no...
Then what happened?

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
He asked me what my name was and I said Beth
And he said "Get away from me Beth."

[KATE MCKINNON]
I don't think I'm on good terms with Santa

[ALL]
Santa

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
But it gets worse
'Cause then I said
"Sorry Santa, we'll leave you alone
But just so you know, you're zipper is down."
And he said
"No no, that's just the fuzzy seame on my Santa suit"
And I said
"No look!"
And then I touched him down there

[Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Why?!

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
I don't know!
Because my brain doesn't work!

[KATE MCKINNON, EGO NWODIM]
We really blew it with Santa

[ALL]
Santa

[BILLIE EILISH]
He thinks I'm a dodo
He thinks I'm a doof

[ALL]
My, oh my, what's that sound on the roof?

[Santa, spoken]
Ho ho ho!

[Billie Eilish, Kate McKinnon, spoken]
Santa!

[Santa, spoken]
Prancer said I should give you one more chance
After all, it is Christmas

[KATE MCKINNON]
It's not our fault Santa

[EGO NWODIM]
We're not good in crowds

[BILLIE EILISH]
We never know what we'll say out loud

[SANTA]
All is forgiven, in fact I bring gifts
As a thank you for this jazzy Christmas
Riff!

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
Wow!

[Santa, spoken]
What do you say?

[Ego Nwodim, spoken]
My wife

[Santa, spoken]
Try again

[Billie Eilish, spoken]
Thank you Santa
We're weird, but we love you!

[Santa, spoken]
Hey, Santa's a little weird too, hehe

[ALL TOGETHER]
Merry Christmas
Merry Christmas
Merry Christmas!Embed

I pieced it all together late that night

[Chorus]
And I know you don't remember calling me
But I told you even then you looked so pretty
In a hospital bed, I remember you said
You were scared
And so was I

[Bridge]
What if it happened to you on a different day?
On a bridge where there wasn't a rail in the way?
Or a neighborhood street where the little kids play?
Or the Angeles Crest in the snow or the rain?
What if you weren't alone? There were kids in the car
What if you were remote? No one knows where you are
If you changed anything, would you not have survived?
You're alive, you're alive, you're alive

[Chorus]
And I know you don't remember calling me
But I told you even then you looked so pretty
In your hospital bed, I remember you said
You were scared
And so am I
